subtitulo_pagina_inicio: Explore our website and have fun!
texto_instrucciones_juego: Try to get as close to 21 without going over. Face cards are worth 10 points.
dificultad: Value at which the crupier stands:
perdiste: You went above 21, you lose... Your last card was:
uno: 1. The objective of the game is to get a hand as close to 21 as possible without going over.
dos: 2. Each card has a point value: Ace (1 or 11), Two (2), Three (3), ... King (10).
tres: 3. Two cards are dealt to the player and the dealer at the beginning.
cuatro: 4. The player can request additional cards ('Hit') or stand ('Stand').
cinco: 5. The dealer can also request additional cards until reaching 17 or more.
seis: 6. If the player exceeds 21 points, they automatically lose. If the dealer exceeds 21, the player wins.
siete: 7. The player wins if they have a higher score than the dealer without going over 21.
ocho: 8. In case of a tie, it's declared a draw.
